views.markdown:
A awesome Instagram enhancement tweak!

Features include are:
· Long press to inspect/save feed media
· Long press to inspect a high quality profile picture
· Like Button Press/Double tap confirmation
· Save options for story media and disabling of auto-advance
· Save options for expiring direct messages and disabling of auto-close
· Follower/Following spoof
· Verified profile spoof
· Follower check when on a user's profile page

- Updated iOS 13 support - Added zoom controls to videos
- Fixed follower check
- Added manual story viewing
- Fixed spoofing settings
- Added long press controls to stories
- Patched Instagram "DRM"
- A lot of other bug fixes
- Added anonymous story/highlight viewing
- Fixed settings not showing up
- Fixed account switching problems
- Fixed spoofing options
